CustomField.description: If selected, tasks included in an Action Plan will not be given a Due Date that falls on a weekend.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Allows you to automatically reschedule a task that would fall on a Saturday or a Sunday to either a Monday or Friday so you can skip weekends when calculating activity start dates. When checked, a drop down box appears, allowing you to select the day.
CustomField.label: Skip Weekends
